name: Golden Harvest
description:
Golden Harvest

Get ready for this medieval fantasy game made by a wee group of five folks for #LD52, a game jam spanning the 06th-09th of January 2023. The theme for the jam announced on the kick-off was Harvest!

You’ve found a lair with a bountiful hoard. I’m sure the dragon wouldn’t notice a few missing gold pieces. It would be simple, all you need to do is not wake the terrifying dragon from its slumber and make away with enough gold to help the people of your homestead.

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Space Bar to Look at Dragon

Credits

Justin - Programming

Luke  - Programming

Ricardo- Audio

Zain - Visual Development, Character Illustrations & Animations, Item Icons

Rosia - UI Art, UX Design

This game was made for LudumDare 52 with the theme 'harvest', check out the submission page here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/golden-harvest
